DOC.brief_summary: The study conduct determine ProQuad may use place second dose M-M-R II routinely give child 4 6 year old previously immunize M-M-R II Varivax .
DOC.brief_title: A Study ProQuad Healthy 4 6 Year Old Children ( V221-014 )
DOC.criteria: In good health Received primary dose MMR II less equal 12 month age Received primary dose Varivax le equal 12 month age Negative history varicella , zoster , measles , mumps , rubella history receive dose MMR II Varivax Any immune impairment deficiency Exposure measles , mumps , rubella , varicella , zoster 4 week prior vaccination Vaccination inactive vaccine past 14 day Vaccination live vaccine within past 30 day Receipt immune globulin , blood product past 5 month
